description: Component Data for HandBuildComponent rendered by hand-build code registered in the renderer for given `component_type`.

component.description: type of the component to be used in renderer to select hand-build rendering implementation

id.description: id of the backend data this component is for

input_data_type.description: Optional type of the input data. Can be used for frontend customization of the component for concrete data type, eg. by using it in CSS class names.

data.description: JSON backend data to be rendered by the hand-build rendering implementation

title: ComponentDataHandBuildComponent
